data.text:
What is the age of Noam Chomsky?

Noam Chomsky age is 96 Years, his date of birth Dec 07, 1928, horoscope Sagittarius, place of birth Pennsylvania, United States, nationality as American and residence Pennsylvania, United States.

What is the Profession of Noam Chomsky?

Noam Chomsky is an American Professor and Public Intellectual by profession.

Who is Noam Chomsky's wife?

Noam Chomsky wife or spouse name is Valeria Wasserman (m. 2014), Carol Chomsky (m. 1949–2008).

Noam Chomsky father name is William Chomsky and mother name Elsie Simonofsky.
